## Install packages

```{r}
#| label: install
#| echo: true
#| eval: false
options(renv.config.pak.enabled = TRUE)

renv::install("pharmaverse/ggsurvfit")
renv::install("survival")

```

## Load libraries

```{r}
#| label: packages
#| echo: true
#| eval: true
#| message: false
#| warning: false

require(DESeq2)
require(tidyverse)
require(survival)
require(ggsurvfit)
```

### Load data

```{r}
#| label: load data
#| echo: false
#| eval: true

dds <- read_rds("RData/Bulk/2025-06-04_dds.rds")
```
